attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the fileInterface instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the fileInterface instance.

attributes.name: nasServer
attributes.description: NAS server to which the network interface belongs, as defined by the nasServer resource type.

attributes.name: ipPort
attributes.description: Physical port or link aggregation on the storage processor on which the network interface is running, as defined by the ethernetPort resource type.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health of the network interface, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: isSystem
attributes.description: Indicates whether the network interface is a system management interface or an interface for file-based storage.

attributes.name: ipAddress
attributes.description: IP address of the network interface.

attributes.name: ipProtocolVersion
attributes.description: IP protocol version of the network interface.

attributes.name: netmask
attributes.description: IPv4 netmask for the network interface, if it uses an IPv4 address.

attributes.name: v6PrefixLength
attributes.description: IPv6 prefix length for the interface, if it uses an IPv6 address.

attributes.name: gateway
attributes.description: IPv4 or IPv6 gateway address for the network interface.

attributes.name: vlanId
attributes.description: Virtual Local Area Network (VLAN) identifier for the interface. The interface uses the identifier to accept packets that have matching VLAN tags. <p/> Values are 1 - 4094.

attributes.name: macAddress
attributes.description: MAC address of the Ethernet port used for the network interface.

attributes.name: isPreferred
attributes.description: Indicates whether the network interface is a preferred interface for file-based storage. See documentation of preferredInterfaceSettings for details.

attributes.name: replicationPolicy
attributes.description: Replication policy of the network interface.

attributes.name: sourceParameters
attributes.description: The network interface parameters of the source NAS server.

attributes.name: isDisabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether the network interface is disabled.
